mcq.statement: Who laid the foundation stone of the Golden Temple at Amritsar, the holiest place of Sikhism?
mcq.one_liner: The foundation stone of the Golden Temple at Amritsar, the holiest site in Sikhism, was laid by **Hazrat Mian Mir**.
